mapper.select: select edu_id from edu_list where edu_id =#{edu_id}
select edu_id from edu_list order by edu_id desc limit 1

insert into edu_list(edu_id, edu_type, edu_name, edu_teacher, edu_place, edu_content, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_apply_start, edu_apply_end, edu_thumbnail_src, edu_list_status, edu_personnel) values(#{edu_id}, #{edu_type}, #{edu_name}, #{edu_teacher}, #{edu_place}, #{edu_content}, #{edu_start_date}, #{edu_end_date}, #{edu_apply_start}, #{edu_apply_end}, #{edu_thumbnail_src}, '임시저장', #{edu_personnel})
select * from edu_list order by edu_start_date desc
select * from edu_list where edu_id = #{edu_id}

select e.edu_id, edu_type, edu_name, edu_teacher, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_apply_end, edu_personnel from edu_list e left join his_edu h on e.edu_id = h.edu_id and emp_id = #{emp_id} and edu_status not in ('교육취소') where edu_list_status = '결재완료' and edu_apply_end > now() and emp_id is null order by edu_start_date
insert into his_edu(edu_id, emp_id, edu_status) values(#{edu_id}, #{emp_id}, '신청완료')

select edu_his_id, e.edu_id, edu_type, edu_name, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_status from edu_list e, his_edu h where e.edu_id = h.edu_id and emp_id = #{emp_id} and edu_status not in ('교육취소') order by edu_start_date desc

select edu_his_id, h.emp_id, emp_name, edu_name, edu_apply_end, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_status from his_edu h, edu_list l, employee e where h.edu_id = l.edu_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and edu_status != '교육취소' and approval = 0 order by edu_start_date

select edu_his_id, h.emp_id, emp_name, edu_name, edu_apply_end, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_status from his_edu h, edu_list l, employee e where h.edu_id = l.edu_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and edu_name like #{edu_name} and approval = 0

select edu_his_id, h.emp_id, emp_name, edu_name, edu_apply_end, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_status from his_edu h, edu_list l, employee e where h.edu_id = l.edu_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and h.emp_id = #{emp_id} and approval = 0

select edu_his_id, h.emp_id, emp_name, edu_name, edu_apply_end, edu_start_date, edu_end_date, edu_status from his_edu h, edu_list l, employee e where h.edu_id = l.edu_id and h.emp_id = e.emp_id and emp_name = #{emp_name} and approval = 0
delete from edu_list where edu_id = #{edu_id}

select emp_bnum, dname, h.emp_id, emp_name from his_edu h join employee e on h.emp_id = e.emp_id join dept d on e.emp_dnum = d.dnum where edu_id = #{edu_id} and edu_status not in ('교육취소') and approval = 0
update his_edu set edu_status = '교육확정' where edu_id = #{edu_id} and edu_status = '신청완료'
update edu_list set edu_list_status = '교육종료' where edu_id = #{edu_id} and edu_list_status = '교육확정'
select emp_bnum, dname, emp_id, emp_name from employee e join dept d on e.emp_dnum = d.dnum where emp_id = #{emp_id} and approval = 0
